name: 8 Notes
description:
8 Notes is a short ~15 minute first person horror game.

The main character woke up in a strange town, and there is a note under his feet, what is hidden behind cozy houses and flimsy fences?

Will he be able to get out of here alive?

Languages: Eng, Rus

Game design / Development: Evgeny Zubanov

Sound design / Composer: Andrey Ilyushin

Scenario: Sergey Chernov
